section.title: Definition
section.para: The kickstart element specifies the text of a kickstart file. CentOS Studio makes the kickstart available as a file named named ks.cfg included in the os folder of the solution, e.g. http://server.company.com/solutions/samba-server-5-i386/os/ks.cfg. It is also included in the image, and in all images.

informalexample.programlisting: <kickstart> install lang en_US network bootproto=dhcp clearpart --all autopart bootloader --location=mbr timezone America/Vancouver auth --enablemd5 --enableshadow --enablecache rootpw secret selinux --enforcing reboot </kickstart>
